name: Rocket Man (kledwin)
description:
A platformer where you use a rocket launcher to leap through the air! Traverse rooftops, avoid obstacles, unlock doors and find the treasure.

=====Controls=====

Arrow keys: move and jump

W/S: tilt rocket launcher

Space: fire rocket launcher

E: go through doors

F4: toggle fullscreen

=================

This game was made in GameMaker Studio 2. I got the inspiration for the game mechanic from Team Fortress 2's rocket jumping. Hope you enjoy the game.
